name: Terragen World File
summary: A TGW file is a settings file used by Terragen Classic, a program that creates realistic 3D natural scenery. It stores information about a virtual environment, including atmosphere settings (like clouds and haze), lighting conditions, terrain details, and surface features such as texture and elevation. Users can save their world setups in a TGW file and reload them later to continue editing or rendering.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
